posts.postText:
1) Which server: TTT
2) Offender's name: [shameless]
3) Offender's SteamID: STEAM_0:1:43739862
4) Explain the situation in detail: His reason for rdming me was "He's an idiot."
5) Were any specific server rules broken: Rules 1 and 5. (RDM and player disrespect)
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: No.
7) Proof:Damage log 
 http://steamcommunity.com/id/mimeyy/screenshot/650995607974699466/?tab=public  (Spinaltap's "???" was in response to him killing me)
 http://steamcommunity.com/id/mimeyy/screenshot/650995607974701932/?tab=public
Judging from the times of the damage, it looks like a misunderstanding. If it wasn't, it would be a slay at most, with a warning for the player disrespect.
